name: Notion Reading List
description: A nice simple reading list for you to organize your reading.Features:⋄ Reading Goal widget with a progress bar where you can set your goal for the current year and track your progress.⋄ Individual database for authors and genres to make managing your books easier.→ Premium Version→ Versão em PortuguêsQ&ACan I use this template with the Notion free account?Yes!Can I share this template and license with others?No, this product is for personal use only.Any more questions or doubts about the pro
